snippet.title: The Addams Family Mystery Mansion - Coming Soon on iOS & Android
snippet.description:
The Addams Family Mystery Mansion is coming soon on iOS and Android. Pre-Order it now on http://www.addamsfamily.game to be thee first informed once it become available.

Play with your all time favorite characters from The Addams Family!

Get CREEPY and KOOKY with the ADDAMS FAMILY! Can’t wait for the movie? Start collecting all the Addams Family characters right now! Get legendary sweethearts Morticia and Gomez plus Wednesday, Pugsley, Uncle Fester and more. BUILD them a house that’s the stuff of NIGHTMARES! And don’t forget to DECORATE IT: there’s lots of furniture, paintings, carnivorous plants and other weird devices at your disposal to give the Mansion that ADDAMS charm! Enjoy a MYSTERIOUS and SPOOKY story that unfolds as you play! 

Key Features:

COLLECT all the characters from the upcoming movie by MGM
EXPAND the house and unlock NEW CONTENT with every level!
DECORATE and PERSONALIZE your Mystery Mansion!
CRAFT spooky and funny items to meet the Family’s needs!
ENJOY the Addams Family’s charm and humor through our ORIGINAL STORY!

**The official House Building game based on the NEW ANIMATED MOVIE from MGM**

CONNECT WITH US!
